#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	map<char,char> A;
	bool B[ 10 ] = { true, true, false, false, false, false, true, false, true, true }, flag;
	int t, i, n;
	string s, str;
	
	A[ '0' ] = '0';
	A[ '1' ] = '1';
	A[ '6' ] = '9';
	A[ '8' ] = '8';
	A[ '9' ] = '6';
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		cin >> s;
		n = s.length();
		
		flag = true;
		str = "";
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			if( B[ s[ i ] - '0' ] == false ) {
				
				flag = false;
				break;
			}
			else 
				str = str + A[ s[ i ] ];

		if( flag ) {
			
			reverse( str.begin(), str.end() );
			cout << "YES" << endl << str << endl;
		}
		else
			cout << "NO" << endl;

	}

	return 0;
}
